column6: IZP Technologies provides digital marketing solutions in the fields of market research, digital marketing, Internet and telecom, and user experience for the telecom media technology industry. Its solutions include tactics formulation, data analysis, advertisement optimisation, effect monitoring, advertising implementation, and tactics implementation; AdWib, a mobile advertising solution; Adwin, a keywords advertising scheme on the Internet; Internet TV Show, an integrated media platform for TV commercial clients; AdEngine, an advertising marketing scheme Ad engine; and ZBoss, an advertising business operating system that integrates Ads customisation, statistics statement, charging management, and system configuration and other operating modules. IZP Technologies was founded in 2008 and is based in Beijing, China.
